ESRS 1 paragraph 77 provides definitions of three main time intervals for the undertaking to adopt:
short-term, corresponding to the ‘reporting period in its financial statements’; medium-term,
lasting ‘from the end of the short-term reporting period … up to 5 years’; and long-term for periods
of ‘more than 5 years’.
